0.name: Closed
0.description: Players begin the game with their hands face down.

2.name: Same
2.description: Captured if adjacent ranks are equal on 2 or more sides.

3.name: Plus
3.description: Captured if adjacent ranks sum up to the same value on 2 or more sides.

4.name: Combo
4.description: Cards captured by Same or Plus subsequently capture adjacent cards with the basic rule.

5.name: Same Wall
5.description: The edges of the board are counted as A ranks for the purposes of the Same rule.

6.name: Elemental
6.description: Elements are randomly placed on the board. If a played card matches the element, its ranks are increased by one. If not, they decrease by one.

7.name: Random
7.description: Both player's start with a random selection of cards from their collections.

8.name: Sudden Death
8.description: In the case of a draw, the game begins again with each player using the cards they captured in the last round.

9.name: Take One
9.description: The winner selects one card from their opponent's hand.

10.name: Take Direct
10.description: Player's keep only the cards they've captured.

11.name: Take Difference
11.description: Subtract the losing score from the winning score; this is how many cards the winner will take from their opponent's hand.

12.name: Take All
12.description: The winner takes all cards from their opponent's hand.
